title: Build Your Own Driver: Tabularis Gets a Plugin System
excerpt: Supporting every database in the world is an impossible task for a small team. So we built a plugin system that lets anyone add a new database driver — in any language.

title: Talk to Your Database: AI Assistant Lands in v0.8.0
excerpt: Sometimes you know what you want but not exactly how to write the SQL. v0.8.0 brings an AI assistant that generates queries from plain English — locally or in the cloud.

title: Passwords in the Keychain, Queries in Three Languages
excerpt: v0.6.0 integrates system keychain storage for credentials and ships the full UI in English, Italian, and Spanish.

title: Schema Management Gets Serious
excerpt: v0.5.0 turns the sidebar into a full schema editor. Create tables, modify columns, manage indexes and foreign keys — all without writing DDL by hand.

title: Point, Click, Query: The Visual Query Builder
excerpt: Not every query needs to be typed from scratch. v0.4.0 ships a Visual Query Builder that lets you drag tables, draw JOINs, and generate SQL automatically.
